q: , Stephen Colbert , Jimmy Kimmel , Craig Ferguson , and Jimmy Fallon -- David Letterman is the only host who owns his show. It's the opposite of Conan O'Brien 's setup at NBC, says Jeffrey Ross , a partner in the company. Conaco owns the show, and TBS is a participant. At Tonight, NBC owned the show, and we were participants. And ownership makes all the difference for Conan O'Brien and his team. the inaugural season of THE X FACTOR begin on Sunday, March 27 in Los Angeles at the L.A. Sports Arena. Chicago, Dallas, Miami, New York/New Jersey and Seattle will also host auditions. it again.'' Plipton approached the show with caution, fearing it would not be as good without beloved iconic`` mean judge'' Simon Cowell .`` But I truly enjoyed it,'' Plipton said. I thought Steven Tyler was hilarious and honest. I didn't expect much from him or Jennifer Lopez and I thought they did a great job. I think this season is going to be great. I loved their rawness and honesty. More than anything, I enjoyed Steven Tyler . He is a funny guy. Sarah, however, was not won over.
